summary: This is my version of this armor. the original wasn\'t to my taste so i darkend it up and added a better white tree logo.  this is a darker version of gondorian steel armor.  nd a thx to balrog124578koko for texture design.
descriptionHtml:
I DID NOT MAKE THIS ARMOUR. THIS GUT DID  
Link below
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4937
I give credit to this person for the design but not the color. i did the color part.

The shield is from the lotr shield pack. 
Link below
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12045
Shield not included
 Coments are appreciated. (First time Doing something like this)
Also this will replace your nord plate armor in you data directory. 
(if you don\'t know how to install just ask)
author: Gfal47
